channel.title: Gold Crowns on 2+ Player Rights on TestScape?
channel.description:
Okay, here's the deal:
I just downloaded a TestScape source, considering I hate all these junked-up-pre-made-for-lazy-people servers, and when I put my character-rights at 2 or above, which I usually set at 3, the gold crown doesn't appear.
Does anybody know how to fix this?
Thanks in advance, Zach

item.title: Gold Crowns on 2+ Player Rights on TestScape?

item.title: Gold Crowns on 2+ Player Rights on TestScape?
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“cheeseblock, post:7, topic:192310”]dude if the testscape source has a data folder or config go into it and look for a administrators.java and put ur name in it and it should show up[/quote]eh nah i figured it out
